reuters.title: API SAYS DISTILLATE STOCKS OFF 7.35 MLN BBLS, GASOLINE OFF 2.89 MLN, CRUDE OFF 4.39 MLN
reuters.body: Oper shr 94 cts vs 93 cts Oper net 8,889,000 vs 8,570,000 Revs 155.0 mln vs 123.4 mln Avg shrs 9,450,000 vs 9,174,000 NOTE: Net excludes discontinued operations a gain of 4,679,000 dlrs, or 50 cts a share vs a loss of 720,000 dlrs, or seven cts a share. 1986 net includes charge of 865,000 dlrs from repeal of investment tax credits Company corrects 1985 year per-share operating net in table which originally ran march 10 Reuter 
